channel.title: 2019 on Ben Selby
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on Ben Selby

item.title: Books 2019
item.description:
One of my new years resolutions was to try and read 10 books this year. That may not sound a lot, but when you have a myriad of other things going on in your life, that’s a tall order. This is what I’ve managed to read.

Books
Dark Sacred Night Michael Connelly

I’m a massive Connelly fan, I’ve read and kept all the Bosch novels he’s ever written. I’m not a hoarder at all, but this is the only series of books I’ve kept. There seems to be a transition here with the introduction of Ren√©e Ballard and I think she’s great. Maybe more of the Ballard books are to come, whilst the TV show focuses on Bosch?
